messages.subject: Re: TAKIGAWA FAMILY
messages.msgSnippet: ...in particular, I m searching to know if is it true that Takigawa Kazumasu (a Nobunaga Oda general) had a cousin called Masuuji. And, above all, I m
messages.messageBody:
...in particular, I'm searching to know if is it true that
Takigawa Kazumasu (a Nobunaga Oda general) had a cousin called
Masuuji.

And, above all, I'm searching information about the second son of
Masuuji: Keiji. (I'm searching from a lot of time).


Keijiro Maeda

messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@y..., "Forest Seal" <oceanair@h...> wrote:
> RE:
> I'm searching the takigawa family's cronology.
> Does anyone know where can I find it?
> Keijiro Maeda
>
> This is a link to a genealogy of the Takigawa family of Owari (not
sure if
> that's the Takigawa you mean) and a brief history in Japanese.
>
> http://www2.harimaya.com/sengoku/html/takiga_k.html


Thank you for your help!...

But I have a little problem: I'm italian and I don't understand
japanese at all!!!

I'm searching somethings in english...
...or someone who translate me all!


Keijiro Maeda

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] TAKIGAWA FAMILY
messages.msgSnippet: RE: I m searching  the takigawa family s cronology. Does anyone know where can I find it? Keijiro Maeda This is a link to a genealogy of the Takigawa family of
messages.messageBody:
RE:
I'm searching the takigawa family's cronology.
Does anyone know where can I find it?
Keijiro Maeda

This is a link to a genealogy of the Takigawa family of Owari (not sure if
that's the Takigawa you mean) and a brief history in Japanese.

http://www2.harimaya.com/sengoku/html/takiga_k.html
